subject: UEFA European Football Championship
Soccer
lead_paragraph: France has put together 19 games without defeat as the Euro 2012 approaches, but in more recent tournaments, including the World Cup two years ago, the squad was divided and disputatious.
snippet: France has put together 19 games without defeat as the Euro 2012 approaches, but in more recent tournaments, including the World Cup two years ago, the squad was divided and disputatious.
